Author: many_mishaps_melly
Text: Keep at it and avoid those lax. You'll see in my post history that if f'up my body.   It didn't take my digestive system too long to recover though. About a week, which feels like ages but eating stuff with fibre, drinking prune juice and cranberry juice and black coffee in the mornings all help.  Natural lax found in fruit and food is fine.   I have used lax once or twice recently but my body is bouncing back a lot quicker now. Drink lots of water too.   You can push through! It won't take long. x
